oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 2-Phenoxyethanol derived diselenide and related compounds; synthesis of a seven-membered seleninate ester
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: TRIPATHI, SK
SHARMA, S
SINGH, HB
BUTCHER, RJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: GLUTATHIONE-PEROXIDASE ACTIVITY
ACTIVE ORGANOSELENIUM COMPOUND
ANTIOXIDANT ACTIVITY
THIOREDOXIN REDUCTASE
REMARKABLE ACTIVITY
CATALYTIC-ACTIVITY
NMR-SPECTROSCOPY
PZ-51 EBSELEN
IN-SITU
SELENOENZYME
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Syntheses of several diorganodiselenides and, in particular, a seven-membered cyclic seleninate ester derived from 2-phenoxyethanol are described. The seleninate ester was obtained from allyl (2-(2-hydroxyethoxy)phenyl) selenide through a series of oxidation and [2,3] sigmatropic rearrangement steps. The ester exhibits good GPx-like activity in the coupled reductase assay.
